entities.name: floo powder
entities.description: Floo powder is a quick way to travel through the wizarding world, but it requires some skill and knowledge to use correctly.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is a hidden street in London where wizards can buy magical supplies.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is a wizard and the father of Fred and George Weasley.

relationships.description: Harry Potter travels to Diagon Alley through the Floo network.
Fred Weasley also travels to Diagon Alley through the Floo network.
George Weasley travels to Diagon Alley through the Floo network.
Harry Potter is a family member of Arthur Weasley.
